section.title: VmSetOwner
section.para: VmSetOwner assigns an owner to a virtual machine in the CloudForms Management Engine database. If the owner does not exist in the CloudForms Management Engine database and CloudForms Management Engine is configured to use LDAP, it attempts to look up and add the user to the CloudForms Management Engine database.

formalpara.title: Examples
formalpara.para: The following examples demonstrate VmSetOwner usage:

example.title: VmSetOwner WSDL
example.programlisting: <message name="VmSetOwner"> <part name="vmGuid" type="xsd:string" /> <part name="owner" type="xsd:string" /> </message> <message name="VmSetOwnerResponse"> <part name="return" type="xsd:boolean" /> </message>
